prompt:
Please explain how to make the perfect cup of coffee at home using your favorite method or recipe.
Making a perfect cup of coffee at home is all about finding your ideal combination of beans, water temperature, and brewing time. I like to use my French press for this purpose. First, grind fresh beans coarsely. Then, boil water until it reaches about 205 degrees Fahrenheit (just below boiling point). Pour the hot water over the coffee grounds and let it steep for four minutes. Finally, press the plunger gently to allow the liquid to filter through and enjoy your perfect cup of coffee!
